task_description: Find the web dashboard in for the gateway which has the full web management interface and redesign this for ease of use, basic vs advanced modes for regular devs and hackers and consistent design and styling using vercel aisdk UI and ai-elements UI patterns (reimplemented in Lit)

patterns.service_pattern: All UI components use Lit decorators (@customElement, @state())
patterns.route_pattern: Hash-based routing (#overview, #sessions, etc.) with TAB_GROUPS defining navigation sections
patterns.component_pattern: LitElement with css template tag for styles and html template tag for rendering

existing_implementations.description: Found existing dashboard with Lit Web Components. UI is at ui/src/ui/ with views in ui/src/ui/views/. Navigation uses TAB_GROUPS with sections (Chat, Control, Agent, Settings). Settings persist in localStorage.

technical_notes.react_libraries_incompatible: Vercel AI SDK UI (@ai-sdk/react) and AI Elements require React/Next.js. Current project uses Lit Web Components. Solution: Extract design patterns and reimplement in Lit CSS.
technical_notes.existing_design_tokens: base.css already has comprehensive design tokens (colors, shadows, radii, typography)
